data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Mono prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mono, Benin
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Mono, Benin.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Mono to agree with you and with one another.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Mono, Benin to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Watchi people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Watchi people know you.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Mono, Benin.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Mono a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 28,390 believers in Mono to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

location.name: Mono
location.people_groups_list: Foodo, Cabe, Batonu, Baruba, Anii, Gangam
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Foodo (43,000), Cabe (3,100), Batonu, Baruba (928,000), Anii (19,000), Gangam (35,000)
